summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1641, for the improvement of West Fiftieth Street, in The City of Seattle, from Eleventh Avenue Northwest to Fifteenth Avenue Northwest, by constructing a sewer therein, together with all wyes, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewering and draining of said district, under Ordinance No. 17436 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
